page.title: 13Housing in West Bromwich
page.content: The area features a variety of accommodation ranging from a 19th century farm-house to bedsitters in the YMCA. Sandwell council provides a higher than national average of council housing. This council accommodation is mainly semi-detached houses but also includes maisonettes and high-rise tower blocks. Currently there is a policy to move families out of these blocks into houses and to replace them with single people. Vandalism like graffiti and broken lifts has proved a problem in tower blocks and some are now being demolished. Housing associations provide for single people and couples. Private houses range from villas at Â£10,000 to large detached houses with gardens and garage costing Â£50,000
